title: Suppose to be unbanned today.
body:
Today i checked my account, knowing I was to be unbanned due to toxicity. I was expecting to hold up their end of the bargain while I hold up mine, having to work on it. Unfortunately when I checked my account, not only had the ban not been un-lifted, but it still told me that today was the date I were unbanned. Any idea why? I have already submitted a ticket. 


(Fuck)

replies.body: It's set to Pacific time, and the same time the suspension was applied.  I looked into this for you and it is set to lift today but still a bit to go, about an hour more.  Hang tight!
